channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform 2.3 for RHEL 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform 2.3 for RHEL 8

item.title: CVE-2023-5115|2024-08-20T15:41:26.541Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20ansible%20automation%20platform%202.3%20for%20rhel%208
item.description: An absolute path traversal attack exists in the Ansible automation platform. This flaw allows an attacker to craft a malicious Ansible role and make the victim execute the role. A symlink can be used to overwrite a file outside of the extraction path.
